name: Sexy Nights - Rose Quartz Chunky Bracelet
description:
Sexy Nights

She places a pink stone under her pillow.

It's so small.

Her head doesn't detect it at night in her dreams.

To her lover, it's a secret.

She has a secret

The stone has vibrations, it knows what she wants.

It touches her and then him.

Like a ripple.

He looks at her,

With that smile.

She knows what it's about.

He comes closer and touches her face.

She lets out a soft playful laugh.

This is the beginning of a sexy night.

Her secret lies in the stone.

This piece is part of the Poet's Circle Jewelry limited Gemstone Collection. Rose Quartz is the gemstone featured, used for centuries to help you stay looking younger and to attract more romance into your life.

Rose quartz stones, tiny red wooden beads, 18k gold plated chain and clasp, 6 1/2 inches (24 cm) around, non-adjustable.

$55 CAN

name: Blueberry Pie - Turquoise Beaded Bracelet
description:
Blueberry Pie

Waking up on a Sunday, relaxed after the week,

I go to the kitchen without making a squeak.

I open my fridge door and take all that I need,

To bake a grand blueberry pie for my family I’ll feed.

The incense is burning and the music is on low,

The pie is now in the oven, the house is aglow.

It feels warm and alive, a real home to adore,

Where creativity is nourished, where we let big dreams sore.

This home is a home of peace.

This piece is part of the Poet's Circle Jewelry limited Gemstone Collection. Turquoise is the gemstone featured, used for centuries for its strong protective powers, to bring peace to the home and as a symbol of friendship and wealth.

Turquoise stones, dark blue wooden beads, silver plated chain and clasp, 9 inches (23 cm) around, adjustable 2 3/4 inches (7 cm).

$55 CAN

name: The Secret of Feminism - Pink Glass Pearl Bracelet
description:
The Secret of Feminism

The pinkness and rosiness and roundness,

The richness and indulgence,

The girly pretty side,

The fiery red,

The delicate nature,

The strong statement,

The holding of power,

The permission to be a woman,

This is the secret of feminism.

18k gold plated chain and clasp, pink glass beads and red ribbon, 8 3/4 inches (21 cm) full length around, adjustable.

$35.00 CAN

name: Pot of Gold - Elegant Necklace With Cream Ceramic Stones
description:
Pot of Gold

After a long rainy time when the sun starts to shine,

I look to the sky and see a rainbow align.

I’ve been told time to time that at the end of the bow,

There is a pot of gold to find that will cause abundance to flow.

So I head out of town to search for this gold,

I cross rivers and mountains, face high heat and the cold.

I desire these riches, this feeling unfound,

It’s supposed to bring joy, happiness all around!

I leave all of my loved ones, I decide not to look back,

“It’s over there!” I tell myself, as I set on my track.

And days turn to weeks, turn to months then to years,

The pot of gold still concealed, the rainbow no longer appears.

Finally one day I decide enough is enough,

I’m going back home never having found that gold stuff.

I enter my home and my loves all look in my direction,

Their smiles are so large, their eyes full of affection.

My heart fills with love and I’m finally at peace,

After all these long years I can finally release.

I realized something, the night of my return,

Something so basic I needed to learn.

The pot of gold never lay out at the end of the rainbow,

It was in my heart, in my friends, and in their loving glow.

18k gold plated chain and clasp, ceramic beads, sit high on chest. 22 inch (56 cm) chain, fully adjustable length.

$90.00 CAN

name: Red Moon - Flower Pendant Necklace
description:
Red Moon

The red moon appears when the mentality shifts

When confusion and fear lift

When we see life as a gift

On this magic eve it appears in the sky

To answer our cries

To signal goodbye

To the suffering

To say hello to the peace

The use of intuition will increase

The love from our hearts will release

When the red moon appears in the sky

 

18k gold plated chain, red ribbon tie, sits high on the neck, asymmetrical design. 28 1/2 inches (72 cm) total, adjust the length by tying the ribbon at the length you like.

$110.00 CAN
